channel.title: Need help fast! will make you mod!
channel.description:
My players are tryin to get on so this needs to be fast.
I added a new shop, Compiled with no errors, Now when I run it get this.. [IMG]http://i203.photobucket.com/albums/aa234/_M0d_M0par1946/error.jpg[/img]
Please help and explain what I did wrong.
Btw I used a shop tool, Placed the codes in and compiled w/o errors

item.title: Need help fast! will make you mod!
item.dc:creator: @lunden lunden
item.description:
@lunden wrote:

open up client.java
search

                PutNPCCoords = true;

you will see somehing similar to :

} else if (NPCID == SHOPNPCID) { // NAMEOFSHOP PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = NUMBERONSHOP;
under it add ETC SANTA SHOP

} else if (NPCID == 1552) { // Santas stuff uhmkay PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 80;

Read full topic
item.source: Need help fast! will make you mod!

item.title: Need help fast! will make you mod!
item.dc:creator: @loading159 loading159
item.description:
@loading159 wrote:

[quote=“WRX`, post:8, topic:226454”][quote author=modbrian link=topic=297564.msg2391040#msg2391040 date=1218965755]
lol i kno, that why i spam ppl cuz they ask stupid questions

btw mr mopar, wow who cares about mod!
[/quote]
“People” are also new, get over it. You were once a stupid little noob at java too, and probably still are since your spamming and not answering, and also, you just broke a rule. You also just confessed to breaking a Rule. Well fucking done.

Open client.java, press CTRL + G and see whats on line 48.
If you need help further, post here whats on line 48.

Thanks.[/quote]
I agree completely with you… This board is for helping people? If you think that you are THE BEST. Why are you even looking here then… Sorry bro but just respect beggining coders and help them. Don’t think that you’re the best. Because… You’re not.

Read full topic
